items.name: UIElementPoint
items.content: # =================================================================== # # Script: UIElementPoint # # $$COPYRIGHT$$ # # =================================================================== class UIElementPoint ###* * An ui point is like a regular point with an x- and y-coordinate but if one of the * coordinates is changed the needsUpdate property of the * assigned game object will be set to true to trigger a refresh. * * @module ui * @class UIElementPoint * @memberof ui * @constructor * @params {Object} object - The UI object the rectangle belongs to. ### constructor: (object) -> ###* * The UI object the rectangle belongs to. * @property object * @type gs.Object_UIElement ### @object = object ? {} ###* * The x-coordinate of the point. * @property x * @type number ### @x = 0 ###* * The y-coordinate of the point. * @property y * @type number ### @y = 0 @accessors "x", set: (x) -> if x != @x_ @x_ = x @object.needsUpdate = yes get: -> @x_ @accessors "y", set: (y) -> if y != @y_ @y_ = y @object.needsUpdate = yes get: -> @y_ ui.UIElementPoint = UIElementPoint
